long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bkmark is the ultimate bookmarking tool designed to help you save, organize, and manage your favorite web pages effortlessly. With Bkmark, you can quickly save pages, categorize them with tags, and access them from a dedicated dashboard. The extension also allows you to export and import your bookmarks, ensuring your saved pages are always safe and transferable. Experience a streamlined and user-friendly interface that enhances your browsing experience.

Key Features:

- Quick and easy saving of web pages
- Categorize bookmarks with tags for better organization
- Search and filter your bookmarks efficiently
- Export and import bookmarks to manage your data seamlessly
- Responsive and user-friendly design
